title: Tuk Tuk & Peruvian Food Experience
description: Discover the culinary delights of Lima through the eyes of a local on a small-group food tour. Your adventure begins with a tuk-tuk ride around the Chorillos district and along the coast. Next, feast on a traditional Peruvian lunch at a local restaurant. Then, take a walking tour of the Barracco district, and listen to stories not found in any guidebook. Complete the excursion with Peruvian desserts.
all_descriptions: Discover the culinary delights of Lima through the eyes of a local on a small-group food tour. Your adventure begins with a tuk-tuk ride around the Chorillos district and along the coast. Next, feast on a traditional Peruvian lunch at a local restaurant. Then, take a walking tour of the Barracco district, and listen to stories not found in any guidebook. Complete the excursion with Peruvian desserts.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Chorrillos, Chorrillos, Lima RegionAn authentic local travel experience and culinary adventure, in a part of Lima very few travelers explore.Duration: 2 hoursStop At:Barranco, Lima Peruwe’ll take a walking tour of Barranco. It is the best way to get to know one of Lima’s artsy districts known for its colonial-style buildings, bohemian lifestyle, and a unique south-facing location, while hearing stories you won’t ever find in a guidebook.Duration: 1 hour
Biblioteca Municipal, Parque Municipal, Barranco 15063, PeruAddress reference: At the Gate of Biblioteca in the main square of Barranco.
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.

Peruvian Flavors Tour

Jun 2025 • Solo
Arturo is an excellent guide!!! He took us to a local non-tourist market. I tried everything!! Rare fruits, snacks, meals, soups and desserts.
The good thing is they don't want to sell you anything!!! It's just testing. Super remondable. Go fast!!!!

reviews.title: Peruvian Flavors Tour
reviews.text: Arturo is an excellent guide!!! He took us to a local non-tourist market. I tried everything!! Rare fruits, snacks, meals, soups and desserts.The good thing is they don't want to sell you anything!!! It's just testing. Super remondable. Go fast!!!!

reviews.title: Awesome Experience - Don't miss it!
reviews.text: Do not hesitate to book this fantastic tour.  Our expectations were exceeded in every manner.  Arturo, our guide was excepitional.  He was awesome.  He had a passion for his city.  We enjoyed eating at a local restaurant.  Arturo explained everyone of the numerous local dishes.  The food and service was exceptional.  There was a large amount of food.  The four of us were very pleased.  We not only had a great experience but gained a friend.  Incredible tour!!

reviews.title: Explore the coastline, picturesque neighborhood + 4 course lunch and desserts!
reviews.text: Excellent afternoon eating and sightseeing with Arturo. Loved exploring the coastline! We took the TukTuk tour; ate a full 4 course lunch followed by several desserts a few hours later.  All the food was incredible!  They were able to accommodate my mother’s food restrictions as well (no salt).  The walk around Barranco was easy and educational. Such a picturesque neighborhood! Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Great experience on a local food market with a very nice and knowledgeable tour guide! Highly recommended!
reviews.text: It was such a great food tour with Arturo as we experienced the variety of the Peruvian food on a local market in Barranco. He was showing us many dishes from starters, to drinks, fruits, sweets etc. It was really delicious and interesting as Arturo has a great knowledge of the Peruvian food and of the history of his country. He is a nice and funny guy. I really recommend this tour!

reviews.title: The best way to learn about Peru's gastronomy history by tasting some of it!
reviews.text: Our group of 6 joined Arturo our guide and embarked into this wonderful all inclusive food experience tour. We rode on a local bus into another section of town to meet our assigned Tuk Tuk's, where we then started our tour to learn about and taste some of Peru's best down to earth, fresh and local food offers. Arturo accommodated our party needs into his tour, ensuring that we had a pace to fit the group's fitness limitations and food preferences which allowed for a superbly relaxed and enjoyable tour. His selection of stops where he explained in depth about Peru's geographical regions, culture and history, and how they shaped the way Peruvians eat, followed by a lunch stop with a fantastic array of local tasty dishes made for a great culinary and tasty adventure. To close the tour, he walked us thru several areas of town which included some beautiful historic tourist areas, a produce market and then ended with a fantastic tasting of Peruvian chocolate deserts and drinks. This tour went above and beyond our expectations and made for the best experience in Lima during our trip. We highly recommend this tour and Arturo for those visitors who want to learn about Peruvian local dished and history,

reviews.title: Unique Experience and Great Food
reviews.text: This was a really fun tour that truly gave you an experience that you could not replicate on your own. Riding the public bus was interesting, the Tuk Tuk was really fun and we ate at a restaurant for lunch that was truly full of locals. The food was incredible and Sheyla was a fun and knowledgeable guide. Great tour!

reviews.title: Great experience!
reviews.text: What a great tour! Arturo shared a lot of interesting information both about food and Peru, we really appreciated his expertise. Lunch was at a restaurant we never would have found on our own, the dishes were delicious and plentiful. The bus and the tuk tuk were both a fun adventure. I can't recommend this tour enough.

reviews.title: Excellent way to get to know Peru
reviews.text: Our guide Arturo did an amazing job helping us to understand the Peruvian way of dining.  The boys enjoyed touring around in the Tuk Tuks and seeing parts of Lima we hadn't discovered yet.  Arturo took us for lunch at a local spot that wasn't a tourist spot to enjoy an authentic Peruvian meal.  On top of teaching us about dining in Lima he also offered advice for when we moved on to Cusco and the higher altitudes there.  Was a great way to start off our Peruvian adventure and helped make the rest of the trip better by knowing where to go and what to eat.

reviews.title: Absolute blast
reviews.text: This was our first time in Lima, and being from South America we already knew peruvian food, but we felt it'd be a good start for our trip if we took an introductory tour.Didn't really know exactly what to expect when it came to the tour itself, but we were more than pleased with the whole experience.Arturo (our guide) was very punctual, and an absolute delight to tour with. He spoke portuguese very well and language was far from being a barrier to us. He was not only a great tour guide, with a lot of information and insights, but also an overall great company, and very nice guy to have around.The tour itself was super fun and a very comprehensive take on Lima and Peru. The tuk-tuk is an every-day mean of transportation for the people in Lima, and it felt like a very authentic experience to roll around through Chorrillos in one.The food was amazing, the restaurant we were taken to - again - felt very authentic and we could see absolutely no tourists around. We had causa, ceviche and a serve of makis covered in rocoto that were to die for. All of that accompanied by a jar of very nice (the best we had in Lima) Chicha Morada.I tried very hard to think of any criticism or improvement points, but failed to do so. This is a must do while in Lima.Helpful tips: the meal was very generous, so have a light breakfast on the day of the tour.Remember to bring water so you don't have to stop to get it, the tour is long.Bring some money for tips, there's a chance you'll find the Fraile taking his leap, and that guys deserves some money.Be generous when tiping! It's a hell of a work done by the tour guides, they deserve it!

reviews.title: Perfect day in Lima
reviews.text: Arturo was the perfect guide!!!  His English is outstanding.  He was very informative and very helpful. The lunch was a 10.  Would highly recommend him to all.  Thanks Arturo for a great memory
